message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1,200,000 to you. Considering this, I propose to sell the product to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This offer is designed to provide you with an attractive discount while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of doing business with you.
